references.A13LUX01USGP: Luxa, K., and A. Acevedo-Gutierrez. 2013. Food habits of harbor seals (Phoca vitulina) in two estuaries in the central Salish Sea. Aquatic Mammals, 39(1):10-22.
references.A11ACE01USGP: Acevedo-Gutierrez, A., and S. Cendejas-Zarelli. 2011. Noctrunal haul-out patterns of harbor seals (Phoca vitulina) related to airborne noise levels in Bellingham, Washington, USA. Aquatic Mammals, 37(2):167-174.
references.R00DEL01USGP:
DeLong, R.L. and S.R. Melin. 2000. Thirty years of pinniped research at San Miguel Island. Proceedings of 
the Fifth California Islands Symposium, Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History, CA, March 29-April 1, 1999. U.S. Department of Interior, Mineral Management Service Pacific OCS Region: 401-406.
references.R80ANT01USGP: Antonelis, G.A., Jr. and C.H. Fiscus. 1980. The Pinnipeds of the California Current. CalCOFI Rep., Vol. XXI.
references.R00JEF01USGP: Jeffries, S.J., P.J. Gearin, H.R. Huber, D.L. Saul, and D.A. Pruett. 2000. Atlas of Seal and Sea Lion Haulout Sites in Washington. Washington Department of Fish and Wildlife, Wildlife Science Division, 600 Capitol Way North, Olympia WA. 150 pp.
references.A09GRI01USGP: Grigg, E.K., A.P. Klimley, S.G. Allen, D.E. Green, D.L. Elliott-Fisk, H. Markowitz. 2009. Spatial and seasonal relationships between Pacific harbor seals (Phoca vitulina richardii) and their prey at multiple scales. Fishery Bulletin, 107(3):359-372.
references.A12LON01USGP: London, J.M., J.M. Ver Hoef, S.J. Jeffries, M.M. Lance, and P.L. Boveng. 2012. Haul-out behavior of harbor seals (Phoca vitulina) in Hood Canal, Washington. PLoS ONE, 7(6).

habitat_description: Phoca vitulina haul out on: sandy, cobble, and rocky beaches (DeLong and Melin, 2000; Jeffries et al., 2000; London et al., 2012); mud flats (Antonelis and Fiscus, 1980; Jeffries et al., 2000; London et al., 2012; Peterson et al., 2012); and rocky reefs (Antonelis and Fiscus, 1980; London et al., 2012; Peterson et al., 2012); as well as man-made structures including logbooms, docks, and breakwaters (Jeffries et al., 2000; Acevedo-Gutierrez and Cendejas-Zarelli, 2011; Luxa and Acevedo-Gutierrez, 2013).
